official_company_name: The Container Corporation of America is now known as Westvaco, Inc., a leading global paper and packaging company. Exxon Mobil is an American multinational oil and gas corporation. Coca-Cola is an American multinational beverage corporation. Procter & Gamble is an American multinational consumer goods corporation. TerraCycle is a global leader in innovative recycling systems. Owens-Illinois Glass Company is a leading global manufacturer of glass packaging products. American Can Company is a leading global manufacturer of metal packaging products. Plastic Bottle Institute is a non-profit organization that promotes the development of plastic bottle recycling. Society of Plastics Industry is a trade association that represents the plastics industry. Sustainable Packaging Coalition is a non-profit organization that promotes sustainable packaging practices. Pratt Institute is a private college of art and design located in Brooklyn, New York. Californians Against Waste is a non-profit organization that advocates for waste reduction and recycling in California.
